meanings.sent1: The skidooer raced across the snow on their skidoo.
meanings.sent2: I saw a skidooer zooming past me on their skidoo.
meanings.sent3: The skidooer tried to do a trick on the skidoo but ended up in a snowbank.
meanings.sent4: She was a fearless skidooer, conquering the snowy hills with ease.
meanings.sent5: The skidooer's bright orange suit made them easy to spot on the white snow.

meanings.sent1: I skidooered away from the icy patch to avoid slipping.
meanings.sent2: The kids love to skidooer down the hill in winter.
meanings.sent3: He tried to skidooer out of doing his chores, but his mom caught him.
meanings.sent4: The car skidooered to a stop just in time to avoid hitting the deer.
meanings.sent5: The leaves skidooered across the yard in the strong wind.
